title: Bonus Episode # 10 – "Sleep Tight" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this bonus episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you two terrifying tales from authors PerfectCircle35 and Michael Whitehouse, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about fiendish “friends” and bedside beasts.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
